Episodes.Title: Pool
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Two days after the dance, Maya and Anna reluctantly go to a lame pool party. A crush unexpectedly shows up, causing them to question their sanity and reputations.

Episodes.Title: Wrestle
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Taylor Nichols
Episodes.Plot: Maya zeros in on her crush, while Anna deals with the fallout from her parents' divorce. Together they find outlets in an unexpected extracurricular activity.

Episodes.Title: Vendy Wiccany
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Anna and Maya discover secret powers within, allowing them to control rocky aspects of their lives through magic.

Episodes.Title: Three
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Witnessing their daughters reach a new low, Kathy and Yuki rally around them. At school, Maya and Anna receive an opportunity at redemption but it will come with a range of influences.

Episodes.Title: Sleepover
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Maura hosts a group sleepover at her house. The clock chimes late into the night as secrets and masks threaten the death of friendships.

Episodes.Title: Play
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Taylor Nichols
Episodes.Plot: When Maya gets a part in a play without Anna, Anna joins the set crew with her ex and his new girlfriend.

Episodes.Title: Opening Night
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: It's opening night. Hearts are exposed, forcing both Anna and Maya to grow up.

Episodes.Title: Jacuzzi
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Taylor Nichols
Episodes.Plot: On vacation with Curtis, Anna and Maya are introduced to new crippling insecurities. The girls try to ignore them, but a mystical turn makes their self-doubt impossible to forget.

Episodes.Title: Bat Mitzvah
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: An upcoming Bat Mitzvah forces Maya to face a realization about her family's economic status while Anna grapples with an existential crisis.

Episodes.Title: Shadow
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Anna helps her dad move into an apartment. Maya is confronted by a surprise visitor from Japan.

Episodes.Title: Yuki
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: A day in the life of Yuki.

Episodes.Title: Grammy
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: A new family member comes to live with Anna but their arrival brings unexpected endings. Maya gets a diagnosis.

Episodes.Title: Luminaria
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Melora Walters
Episodes.Plot: Anna and Maya attend the local "Walk For Cancer." Opportunities for socializing evolve into inklings of mortality.

Episodes.Title: Runaway
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Anna is given the opportunity of a lifetime but when her parents won't let her partake, Maya encourages them to take fate into their own hands and embark on a dangerous journey.

Episodes.Title: Home
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Anna and Maya are far from where they began. Now all they want is to go back home.
